intro: Leucocoryne lilacea, commonly known as the silver stripe lily, is a species of flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Amaryllidaceae family and is characterized by its striking white and green striped leaves. The plant produces clusters of pale yellow flowers that bloom in the spring. It is a bulbous plant that prefers well-drained soil and partial shade. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardens and indoor cultivation.
